name: Google Ads
description: The Google Ads Connector allows you to access the Google Ads API. This lets you create, update, and delete ad campaigns and ads.

operations.name: init
operations.description: Config operation

operations.name: adGroupAdsMutate
operations.description: Creates, updates, or removes ads. Operation statuses are returned.

operations.name: adGroupsMutate
operations.description: Creates, updates, or removes ad groups. Operation statuses are returned.

operations.name: adsMutate
operations.description: Updates ads. Operation statuses are returned. Updating ads is not supported for TextAd, ExpandedDynamicSearchAd, GmailAd and ImageAd.

operations.name: campaignBudgets
operations.description: Creates, updates, or removes campaign budgets. Operation statuses are returned.

operations.name: campaignsMutate
operations.description: Creates, updates, or removes campaigns. Operation statuses are returned.

operations.name: createCustomerClient
operations.description: Creates a new client under manager. The new client customer is returned.

operations.name: search
operations.description: Returns all rows that match the search query.

operations.name: customersMutate
operations.description: Updates a customer. Operation statuses are returned.

operations.name: audiencesMutate
operations.description: Creates audiences. Operation statuses are returned.

operations.name: customAudiencesMutate
operations.description: Creates or updates custom audiences. Operation statuses are returned.

operations.name: campaignCriteriaMutate
operations.description: Creates, updates, or removes criteria. Operation statuses are returned.

operations.name: userListsMutate
operations.description: Creates or updates user lists. Operation statuses are returned.

operations.name: uploadUserData
operations.description: Uploads the given user data.

connections.name: googleAds
connections.description: Connection for interacting with Google Ads.
